column5: Has anyone used gamma copolymer? Is it good? Is it like Monofilament? Is there any other mono anyone reccomends? Thanks  Bassmaster4
Haven't used the Gamma co-poly but I've been using the Yo-zuri and P-Line ones. Very good lines.  FHR
I use the 6lb test. Strong stuff and not to expensive. It's really good line.  and as fish head said the p-line is also strong stuff.
strong enough to use 6 lbs test for pike and bass?
i use the 12 and 10 lb, great line but not that much different from regular mono
Not for pike. I wouldn't even use it for bass. Go with at least 10lb for the pike. Bass I'd suggest at least 8lb.   FHR
I have my power pro for bass and pike. But I have use gamma for pike and bass did just fine.
Go with P - Line Cxxx this strong line or try the FIN'S Evolution.
